functions.name: Popover
functions.description: Re-export of Radix Popover root for composition.

functions.name: PopoverTrigger
functions.description: Re-export of Radix Popover Trigger for composition.

functions.name: PopoverContent
functions.signature: const PopoverContent = React.forwardRef<..., ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof PopoverPrimitive.Content>>(({ className, align = 'center', sideOffset = 4, ...props }, ref) => JSX.Element)
functions.description: Styled Radix Popover.Content wrapped in a Portal. Applies consistent design system classes, default align/offset, and animations. Forwards ref.

notes: Small wrapper around Radix primitives to centralize styles and usage.
